page.title: 02ADMASTON VILLAGE
page.content: Admaston is a country village.It is set out in the country side and is usually very quiet.It has only five shops,they are the Hairdressers,the Wool shop,Offlicense,Newsagents and a Post Office. Most of the people that live in Admaston are farmers living off the land.They keep animals which they sell for food in the winter and fatten them up during the summer.Admaston consists of mainly fields.There are smaller estates set around the Admaston area and have different things for the young people to do at night, EG;guides,scouts and youth clubs.There are many fields and wildlife,in the area.Cows and sheep etc,graze in the fields.
